general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail over the district of Khordha for the next five days. Ensure proper irrigation and monitoring for pests and diseases in crops.

advisory: Apply Cartap Hydrochloride or Chlorantraniliprole for nursery area before transplanting to manage pests.
Select resistant varieties to prevent red rot disease.
Soak setts in a recommended solution before planting.
Use Neem Based Pesticide to control leaf miner.
Use yellow sticky traps to attract and kill Whitefly.
Use recommended fungicides to control Downey mildew.
Ensure proper soil preparation and fertilization before transplanting onion seedlings.
Spray recommended pesticides for mite control.
Spray recommended fungicides to control leaf blight and stem rot.
Apply carbofuran to control root knot nematode.
Insulate poultry house against cold wind during winter.
Provide mineral and calcium to laying birds.
